title: can anyone tell me how to report scripts?
body: they are famous in diamond 1 ranks  like RNG IMP and TSM Ezreal, usually use kogmow ,ezreal ,kalista,ryze and Xerathï¼Œand the system never work,is there anyone can help me ? i can show u the photos of and history of those scripting games

replies.body: They ban in waves apparently. Which is super dumb because they don't do that for people who are toxic and not hacking, they get banned on the spot. So likely a ban wave has not happened yet.
